body.name: Edward Tools Extra Large Industrial Metal Dust Pan 17” - Heavy Duty Powder Coated Steel does not chip or bend - Great for large cleanups - Rubber Grip Loop handle for comfort/hanging (1)
features: Extra Large dustpan 17” size for the heaviest of clean ups
Heavy duty powder coated steel that does not chip or bend like competing metal dustpans
Precision edge for easier sweeping small items
Rubber coated grip ergonomic handle for easier grip and to allow hanging dust pan after use
Lifetime warranty - Find a way to bend or chip this big metal dustpan and we will refund or replace your order
body.description: Edward Tools Extra Large Industrial Metal Dust Pan 17” is a large metal dust pan made for the biggest clean ups. The premium powder coated steel will not chip or bend like other dust pans on the market. The rubber looped handle is more comfortable and allows the big metal dustpan to be hung up when not in use. This industrial dust pan’s edge is thin enough to sweep small items but thick enough to not bend. A ridge just inside the edge allows the swept items to stay inside while work. Edward Tools Extra Large Industrial Metal Dust Pan 17” comes with a lifetime warranty!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #95,298 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #19 in Commercial Dustpans #110 in Household Dustpans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Size and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. Nice and wide and very study. We use it to move around gravel or sweep our garage when we don't want to use our dinky plastic tray or bend over constantly. People weren't kidding about the tough sticker though. I used a hair dryer to soften the sticker before peeling it off and that did the trick!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the dustpan. I use it outside for picking up in the yard and also in my garage. It is sturdy and easy to use. I definitely recommend it. I hardly find quality made items anymore. This one is a keeper for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: My husband does yards for about 50 homes and really loves this product. It is sturdy and large and he is easily able to dump debris into his garbage can. The only downside is that he would have loved it just a bit deeper, like maybe 1/2" or so. The neutral rating on light weight is because it isn't and isn't meant to be. He wanted metal because the plastic bins do not hold up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid construction, good grip, and completely functional
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a large dustpan to pick up debris from sweeping a deck under a large tree. I went ahead with this dustpan, as it looked sturdy, and had the large size I wanted. I was happy when I got it. The construction is solid, the finish is good, and the handle has a comfortable foam grip. The handle also seems like it will be fine over the years as the foam either hardens or falls off. I expect this dustpan will last years, and be fully-functional all the time. It's a dustpan, so there is a limit to how excited I can get, but really, this was all that I asked for and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dustpan is very sturdy and trash can be swept onto it very easily
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time purchasing this dustpan. This dustpan is very sturdy and trash can be swept onto it very easily. I looked at different dustpans, before, I purchased this one. The other dustpans were either plastic, aluminum, or else cheap metal. This dustpan is made of solid metal. The handle has a nonslip covering which make it easy to hold and grip. This dustpan come in two sizes. It comes in a 12 inch or else 17 inch. I purchased the 17 inch twice. I am very happy with my purchases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars NASA called - they want thier glue back
reviews.reviewText: I almost gave this a one star because of that stupid label. I read and followed the other reviewer's suggestion to heat up the dust pan and peel the label off. And yes, this works.However, I was still left with stubborn adhesive . I tried alcohol, magic eraser, dish soap, and elbow grease. I tried scraping it off and scratched the pan. (@!#*!@*)People, I finally found the answer: WD40 to the rescue! It came off in seconds.So, to future buyers:1. Heat the dust pan on low over the stove.2. Peel off the label3. Squirt with WD40 and remove with a paper towel4. Enjoy your Mack Daddy of dust bins. It's solid, heavy, and awesome.You're welcome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Dustpan
reviews.reviewText: This dustpan is beyond any dustpan I have ever had or used. Wide and deep enough to prevent spillover, sturdy with easy to hang onto rubber coated handle. Some folks had an issue removing the label. Some good old Maine ingenuity took it off in 2 minutes. Heated the label CAREFULLY and from a distance with a propane torch on low( a hair dryer would be safer), easily peeled off the label all in one piece and then used Goo Gone Adhesive Remover to clean up the residue. Amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous light weight, durable dustpan for big jobs.
reviews.reviewText: We use this dustpan to clean out our barn and so needed a heavy duty yet light weight dustpan that could hold a lot. This dustpan met ALL of our requirements. It is very durable and strong and doesn't bend out of shape no matter how much dirt we load it up with. We are able to clean the whole barn more quickly and with less effort than what we were previously doing.
